title: When you load into the game and realize you took the wrong runes and masteries

replies.body:
AD masteries and runes on {{champion:37}}. 

*Looks at ADC*

I'm the ad carry now.
http://i3.kym-cdn.com/entries/icons/original/000/018/459/53697461.jpg

> [{quoted}](name=OverpoweredSoap,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=QIGT2VZy,comment-id=0011,timestamp=2016-04-01T01:04:11.766+0000)
>
> AD masteries and runes on {{champion:37}}. 
> 
> *Looks at ADC*
> 
> I'm the ad carry now.

From the games I won:

Jungle Sona - I thought I am support because "Fill" but apparently got jungle that one game. Sona is actually not THAT bad as jungle as long as you dont get invaded. After 6 you just E, run into lane, land your ult and it's a free kill .
Smiteless Master Yi jungle

This is how I feel right now. I'm about to fight Irelia top as Sion. 

I should have asked them to ban her...

Just played a game earlier with our Irelia vs Sion.
Three mirror matchups too...(Aurelion, Bard, and Udyr).
Needless to say Sion got screwed.

I surprisingly did very well.  I ended that game with 7/0/10 and over 200 CS.  My tower never fell.  Got an S- which is fantastic since I've been getting nothing but A-'s on my main.  

I think that {{champion:39}} just didn't know how to play Irelia.  She had a skin, so it wasn't a free week player.

gg scrub, not utilising ur passive
reprot this noob

kappa
It's true!  Our {{champion:30}} used his passive to greater affect than I could!  I am so ashamed!

still better than {{champion:143}} 

like should i even try to hit someone?... nah i just press q as fast as i can so i die faster

Every once in a while, a low health scrub will forget about her passive and stay still for the full 3 seconds it takes to fire.
And 1 second it takes to travel.

Otherwise, ya. Better of just getting started on that death timer.

I love people who disrespect the power of certain champions. I had a game recently where I kept winning 1v1 against a Volibear jungler. I was Sion jungle. 

I felt so satisfied.
Hooray for Sion.

i used to play irelia  a lot, but after darius rework... i just rather not, i fed too many darius that just the thought of facing darius makes me want to dodge/go afk

but holy cow how i was happy to learn quinn can win easy against darius... but she got reworked {{item:3070}} {{sticker:zombie-nunu-tears}}
I actually really hate Irelia.  How do you counter/fight her?

the best thing against her are quick trades like renekton, he goes in stun and goes out

with sion be fast with your q before she cancels it with her E stun/slow (in her animation she'll strike down with 2 blades) if she has less health than you, you'll get stunned. 
be careful of fighting her when she activates her w (the center of her 4 blades will glow yellow) she'll do true damage so try to disengage
she can 'move like yasuo' if the minions are with low health

try playing her, its the best way to know her, i'd say she's weak before she gets her items sheen, trinity force and when she's oom

I've tried her before. She felt rather boring. 

I don't actually hate her as much as I used to now. Guess I just needed a little confidence boost.
Dude the reworked Quinn is cancer and much better against darius. Trust me on this one, I'm a Darius main. I kill myself when its a Quinn top, its worse than satan teemo top against dar.

> [{quoted}](name=Ralanr,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=QIGT2VZy,comment-id=000000000000,timestamp=2016-03-31T21:23:22.228+0000)
> I think that {{champion:39}} just didn't know how to play Irelia.  She had a skin, so it wasn't a free week player.

was it frostblade?
Nightblade.
idk what went wrong
She didn't use her stun much or actually try to trade with me.  She was pretty bad.

I honestly really like playing that matchup.
{{summoner:31}}

http://media0.giphy.com/media/4NuAILyDbmD16/giphy.gif
did it the other day as well...
AD Vel'Koz FTW.

LOL
I had an AD Vel'Koz on my team once.
Fervor harrass OP
{{summoner:31}}

That's when you adjust your build to accommodate your masteries and runes. ;)

adc bard for the win
Ap Talon guys!! It's totes a thing.
But... but you can't build longswords if you're AP... you *monster!*
Tank runes and masteries on{{champion:15}}
Ap Vayne, here we go.

Did this the other day with {{champion:9}} 
Pure Atck speed  41% -----FML right?
lol
well it wasn't so bad jungle clear at start was better overall dmg from spells were down but we still won and I had a better Kill to death ration. Crittle Sticks 0_0
Guess I'm going full AD Aurelion Sol then :D
It's worse when you forget to change your sums too. Done that a few times.

AD smite {{champion:16}} 

Beware the bananas.
can relate to that, its sad, but its can be worst like when you take that mastery page without a single point in it because you forgot to save
Upvote for the Evangelion :D excellent taste as always Malicious Metal

And you end up winning. 

AD {{champion:99}} new meta.

I uhh...
took uhh...
Ap runes and masteries....
on uhh...
uh..
hehe...
Fiora......
Yesterday...
W damage op af
I actually didn't do too bad mid-late,buttt when I fed the kennen, he was one shotting me so I couldn't do much but still helped
I once took my Windspeaker's Blessing support masteries on Singed. It was awkward, but the AP runes were okay.
That hp regen from ult must've been great though.
I remember once I took Thunderlord's on Nasus once. Thankfully, Thunderlord's works on everyone and E max is a silly chunking tool.
Just roll with it. That's what I do.
SO TRUE. #FullLifeStealRyze BB!

Whoops, left on the AP set while playing ADC {{champion:21}} ? Not a problem, just start with a {{item:1056}} and start building AD after first back. Meanwhile both Q and E are happily chunking my lane opponent 'cause dual scaling on the Q. 11+ MPen Thunderlord procs also aren't a bad thing to have...
Evangelion gifs are always welcome in my book.
Took my velkoz masteries yesterday as J4 ...did not turn out well.
Try invading with AP {{champion:64}} with DFT. It just hurts me when I take spellvamp quints on him...
